item.description:
Hello all!

This meet-up will an informal social meeting. Take an hour to come out, meet a few new people and enjoy great conversation.

We will be discussing ideas for future professional development workshops and speakers. I can't wait to hear your suggestions.

I look forward to seeing you!

Best,

Qiana

When: May 21, 2009 6:00 PM

Where: District Restaurant & Lounge
180 Lincoln Street
Boston, MA 02111
617-426-0180
item.name: Professionals of Color Business & Social Networking Group November Meetup
